bill.title: Mississippi Student Athletes Protection Act; enact.
bill.description: An Act To Require Local School Boards To Develop Guidelines And Other Pertinent Information And Forms To Inform And Educate Student Athletes And Their Parents Or Legal Guardians Of The Nature And Risk Of Concussion And Brain Injury; To Mandate Athletic Head Injury Safety Training Be Taken By All Coaches Employed By The School District; To Require Any Student Athlete Who Is Suspected Of Sustaining A Concussion Or Brain Injury In Practice Or Game To Be Immediately Removed From Participation Until The Athlete Is Evaluated And Granted Written Clearance By An Examining Licensed Physician; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Education;Public Health and Human Services
